title: Fix Corporate Tab Tree Structure
description: The corporate tab currently shows plain text instead of the intended visual tree structure. Alex investigated and found the CSS was accidentally placed inside a mobile-only media query. Need to: 1) Move CSS outside media query, 2) Test on both desktop and mobile, 3) Ensure tree visualization works with connecting lines and proper hierarchy.
notes: Alex already did root cause analysis - CSS classes .corp-tree, .corp-level, .corp-node are inside @media (max-width: 768px) instead of being base styles
